alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:51AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Little River, west central Sevier and southeastern McCurtain Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 350 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Broken Bow, or 16 miles west of Horatio, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Foreman, Idabel, Broken Bow, Arkinda, Haworth, Eagletown, Bokhoma, Moon, Cerrogordo, Goodlake, Harris, Goodwater, Shinewell, Tom, America, West Line and West Otis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
